title: FocusMe for Outlook
description: Ceptara's FocusMe application is a Microsoft Outlook 2010, 2013 & 2016 add-in designed to help you and your team achieve greater focus. It helps you get more organized via features include including 5D email processing, organizing your mail, tasks, appointments, documents, and notes by Project, task planning support, and time tracking and timecards.  It includes task planning tools such as Gantt charts, MindMaps and free/busy scheduling.
